blogPost.title: What are some possible mental health issues in the remote setting? Answer by @amix3k, Async-first Founder/CEO of @doist. https://t.co/5410482TSA https://t.co/jexVDClQQ5
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 远程环境下可能出现的心理健康问题有哪些？回答者：@amix3k，Async-first创始人/CEO @doist。https://t.co/5410482TSA https://t.co/jexVDClQQ5。
遠程環境下可能出現的心理健康問題有哪些？回答者：@amix3k，Async-first創始人/CEO @doist。https://t.co/5410482TSA https://t.co/jexVDClQQ5。
リモート環境で考えられるメンタルヘルスの問題とは？回答者：@amix3k, Async-first Founder/CEO of @doist. https://t.co/5410482TSA https://t.co/jexVDClQQ5

previous.title: What are some simple tips that can make people more effective at public speaking? Answer by Jason Patel, Founder of @Transizion_. https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g

localize.full_text: 有哪些简单的技巧可以让人们更有效地进行公众演讲？由@Transizion_创始人Jason Patel回答。https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g。
有哪些簡單的技巧可以讓人們更有效地進行公衆演講？由@Transizion_創始人Jason Patel回答。https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g。
人前で話すときに効果的な人を作る簡単なコツとは？Answer by Jason Patel, Founder of @Transizion_. https://t.co/GrZwt086Pb https://t.co/XsFQXCYz8g

next.title: What are some pandemic prevention strategies that would help us prepare before the next one? Answer by Ali Khan, Dean and Professor, College of Public Health UNMC. https://t.co/6GlmiDUY0z https://t.co/EDqur0yRhn

localize.full_text: 在下一次大流行之前，有哪些预防策略可以帮助我们做好准备？回答者：Ali Khan，UNMC公共卫生学院院长和教授。https://t.co/6GlmiDUY0z https://t.co/EDqur0yRhn。
在下一次大流行之前，有哪些預防策略可以幫助我們做好準備？回答者：Ali Khan，UNMC公共衛生學院院長和教授。https://t.co/6GlmiDUY0z https://t.co/EDqur0yRhn。
次のパンデミックの前に準備しておくべきパンデミック防止策を教えてください。回答者：Ali Khan（UNMC公衆衛生学部学部長兼教授） https://t.co/6GlmiDUY0z https://t.co/EDqur0yRhn
